popover.primary: A mastery path focused on longer-duration battles
A mastery path focused on dealing quick exhaustive blows
A mastery path focused on area of effect offensive abilities

data.name: Accuracy
data.description: Flurry will now hit up to 24 targets within 30 feet in front of you, but the base damage is reduced by 20%.
data.rawDescription: Flurry will now hit up to 24 targets within {ABIL_1435_COM_1_RADI_FEET} in front of you, but the base damage is reduced by 20%.

data.name: Ancestral Inheritance
data.description: Increases your Armor by 660.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Armor by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Break Loose
data.description: Your mounting rage allows you to firm your Dwarven resolve and remove all roots and snares from you.  For the next 10 seconds, roots and snares will have no effect on you.
data.rawDescription: Your mounting rage allows you to firm your Dwarven resolve and remove all roots and snares from you.  For the next {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}, roots and snares will have no effect on you.

data.name: Breaking Point
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit with Path of the Giantslayer abilities by 15%, but if you are dual wielding, increases the chance that you'll be critically hit by 10%.
data.rawDescription: Increases your chance to critically hit with Path of the Giantslayer abilities by 15%, but if you are dual wielding, increases the chance that you'll be critically hit by 10%.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.
data.rawDescription: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} in front of you.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Increases your Strength by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Strength by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Bypass Defenses
data.description: You bolster yourself for 10 seconds, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.
data.rawDescription: You bolster yourself for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, allowing you to bypass the defenses of an enemy keep's postern door, porting you inside.

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You charge into the thick of battle, increasing your movement speed by 50% for 7 seconds.  If you use any abilities, the effect will immediately end.
data.rawDescription: You charge into the thick of battle, increasing your movement speed by {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  If you use any abilities, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Cleft In Twain
data.description: You attack your target with a devastating blow, dealing 360 damage over 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You attack your target with a devastating blow, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to Dodge and Parry all attacks against you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Deadly Determination
data.description: You deal an additional 300 damage, whenever you use an ability. This effect will fade after you damage 8 targets.
data.rawDescription: You deal an additional {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE}, whenever you use an ability. This effect will fade after you damage 8 targets.

data.name: Deathblow
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Great Weapon
data.description:
You unleash a powerful blow, dealing 291 damage.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.
data.rawDescription:
You unleash a powerful blow, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Deep Wound
data.description: You slash at your enemy, dealing 141 damage and reducing the value of incoming healing on them by 50% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You slash at your enemy, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and reducing the value of incoming healing on them by 50% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Determination
data.description: If an Exhaustive Blow is defended, your abilities cost 0 Action Points for the next 6 seconds.
data.rawDescription: If an Exhaustive Blow is defended, your abilities cost 0 Action Points for the next {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Devastate
data.note:
Requires Great Weapon
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
You devastate your target, dealing 191 damage and reducing your target's Wounds by 100 for 10 seconds.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.
data.rawDescription:
You devastate your target, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and reducing your target's Wounds by {COM_1_VAL0} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Distracting Roar
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet are detaunted, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal against you to 50% for 5 seconds.  During this time, all of your attacks will cause enemies to hate you 25% less than normal. If you attack anyone you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.
data.rawDescription: All enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} are detaunted, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal against you to 50% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  During this time, all of your attacks will cause enemies to hate you 25% less than normal. If you attack anyone you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Doom Seeker
data.description: You deal 1200 damage and knock down targets within 30 feet for 3 seconds. This ability hits max 9 targets.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and knock down targets within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}. This ability hits max 9 targets.

data.name: Embrace the Pain
data.description: Each time you take critical damage, your Strength is increased by 120 for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Each time you take critical damage, your Strength is increased by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Enervating Blow
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
You deal an exhaustive blow that does 141 damage and reduces your target's chance to critically hit by 100% for 10 seconds.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.
data.rawDescription:
You deal an exhaustive blow that does {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and reduces your target's chance to critically hit by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL1}% for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Even the Odds
data.description: Your Toughness is increased by 25 for each enemy within 30 feet, up to a maximum of 9 enemies. This effect will fade after 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Your Toughness is increased by {COM_0_VAL0} for each enemy within 30 feet, up to a maximum of 9 enemies. This effect will fade after {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Fierce Might
data.description: As you get closer to death and redemption, your rage fills you with power.  Your critical bonus damage is increased by 10% for every 10% of hit points that you have lost.
data.rawDescription: As you get closer to death and redemption, your rage fills you with power.  Your critical bonus damage is increased by 10% for every 10% of hit points that you have lost.

data.name: Fierceness
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, group member's within 100 feet will have their Weaponskill increased by 25 each time that you hit an enemy with direct damage, and your Initiative will be reduced by 25. This effect can be stacked up to three times.
data.rawDescription: For the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, group member's within 100 feet will have their Weaponskill increased by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0} each time that you hit an enemy with direct damage, and your Initiative will be reduced by {COM_2_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0}. This effect can be stacked up to three times.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 15% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.
data.rawDescription: All of your attacks deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Flurry
data.description: You wildly swing in front of you,  dealing between 103 damage and 153 damage to up to three enemies within 25 feet.
data.rawDescription: You wildly swing in front of you,  dealing between {COM_0_VAL0_COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE} and {COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to up to three enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by 160 for 30 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You stare down your opponent, draining {COM_0_VAL0} of their Action Points into yourself, and reducing their Strength by {COM_2_VAL0} for {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Got No Time For You
data.description: All attacks will generate 25% less hate.
data.rawDescription: All attacks will generate {COM_0_VAL1}% less hate.

data.name: Grievous Harm
data.description: You deal 1800 damage and debuff the target's outgoing damage to 75% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and debuff the target's outgoing damage to {COM_1_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Gudrun's Warcry
data.description: Your groupmates are inspired by your eagerness to fight. Your group's abilities cost 25% fewer Action Points for 20 seconds while within 100 feet of you.
data.rawDescription: Your groupmates are inspired by your eagerness to fight. Your group's abilities cost {COM_0_VAL1}% fewer Action Points for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} while within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Hastened Punishment
data.description: Cooldowns on your Exhaustive Attacks are reduced by 25%.
data.rawDescription: Cooldowns on your Exhaustive Attacks are reduced by {COM_0_VAL0}%.

data.name: Honor Restored
data.description: All your Exhaustive Attacks have a 50% chance to heal you for 225 health.
data.rawDescription: All your Exhaustive Attacks have a 50% chance to heal you for {ABIL_3327_COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH}.

data.name: Incapacitate
data.description: You render an incapacitating blow to your target, dealing 166 damage and knocking them down for 3 seconds. This attack is undefendable.
data.rawDescription: You render an incapacitating blow to your target, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and knocking them down for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}. This attack is undefendable.

data.name: Inevitable Doom
data.description: You deal 108 damage to your target and force them to share your doomed fate, inflicting a dark rune on them.  The rune will explode every 2 seconds and will keep exploding for anywhere between  4 seconds to 8 seconds, dealing 88 damage to all enemies within 30 feet of them.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target and force them to share your doomed fate, inflicting a dark rune on them.  The rune will explode every 2 seconds and will keep exploding for anywhere between  4 seconds to 8 seconds, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_2_VAL0_COM_1_RADI_FEET} of them.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional 606 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} Corporeal damage over {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Looks Like a Challenge
data.description: You deal 800 damage to targets within 30 feet  and debuff incoming healing by 50% for 10 seconds. This ability hits max 9 targets.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to targets within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}  and debuff incoming healing by 50% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}. This ability hits max 9 targets.

data.name: No Escape
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Dual Wield
data.description:
A crippling blow, dealing 141 damage to all enemies within 30 feet. The victims will all become snared, reducing their run speed anywhere from 10% and 40% for 10 seconds.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.
data.rawDescription:
A crippling blow, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}. The victims will all become snared, reducing their run speed anywhere from 10% and 40% for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Numbing Strike
data.note: Requires Target to have Parried or Blocked
data.description: You land a numbing blow, reducing your target's chance to block or parry by 50% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You land a numbing blow, reducing your target's chance to block or parry by {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Onslaught
data.description: You swipe at the enemies in front of you, dealing 300 damage over 9 seconds to enemies within 40 feet.
data.rawDescription: You swipe at the enemies in front of you, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} to enemies within {COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_COM_0_RADI_FEET}.

data.name: Power Through
data.description: Exhaustive Blows will no longer remove your Rage.
data.rawDescription: Exhaustive Blows will no longer remove your Rage.

data.name: Precarious Assault
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description:
A reckless attack which deals 216 damage to your target.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.
data.rawDescription:
A reckless attack which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Pulverizing Strike
data.description: A furious slash that deals 191 damage and reduces your target's Toughness by 25 for 9 seconds. This effect is stackable up to three times.
data.rawDescription: A furious slash that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and reduces your target's Toughness by {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_VAL0} for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}. This effect is stackable up to three times.

data.name: Push For More
data.description: Your autoattack speed is increased by 25% while you are Furious and 50% while you are Berserk.
data.rawDescription: Your autoattack speed is increased by 25% while you are Furious and 50% while you are Berserk.

data.name: Rampage
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your attacks can't be Blocked or Parried. If you are Furious, increase duration to 20 seconds.
data.rawDescription: For the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, your attacks can't be Blocked or Parried. If you are Furious, increase duration to {COM_3_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Reckless Gamble
data.description: While this ability is active, each time you strike a target with a melee attack, you will deal an additional 100 damage, but you will also suffer 50 damage each time this happens.
data.rawDescription: While this ability is active, each time you strike a target with a melee attack, you will deal an additional {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE}, but you will also suffer {COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE} each time this happens.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 Action Points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: A prolonged fervor that grants {COM_0_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS} a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Relentless Strike
data.description: You strike at your opponent, immediately inflicting 108 damage. The wound continues to bleed for 132 damage for the next 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You strike at your opponent, immediately inflicting {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}. The wound continues to bleed for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} for the next {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Retribution
data.description: You strike out at all enemies 25 feet in front of you, inflicting 169 damage every second. The damage inflicted by this ability increases by 15% for every enemy that attacked you within the previous second, to a maximum of 60%.
data.rawDescription: You strike out at all enemies {COM_1_RADI_FEET} in front of you, inflicting {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} every second. The damage inflicted by this ability increases by 15% for every enemy that attacked you within the previous second, to a maximum of 60%.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for 253 damage which they can not prevent.
data.rawDescription: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} which they can not prevent.

data.name: Rune of Absorption
data.description: A merciless string of attacks that repeatedly hit your target for 194 damage up to 6 times over the next 5 seconds. You will be healed for all the damage that this ability deals.
data.rawDescription: A merciless string of attacks that repeatedly hit your target for {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} up to 6 times over the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You will be healed for all the damage that this ability deals.

data.name: Runic Blessings
data.description: Upon falling in battle, you have a 25% chance of immediately getting back in the fight at 25% health and unleashing a blow to all enemies within 40 feet and dealing 250 damage.
data.rawDescription: Upon falling in battle, you have a 25% chance of immediately getting back in the fight at 25% health and unleashing a blow to all enemies within {ABIL_3190_COM_0_RADI_FEET} and dealing {ABIL_3190_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.
data.rawDescription: A directed strike that inflicts {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target.

data.name: Shatter Limbs
data.description: You brutally crush all enemies within 30 feet, dealing 80 damage. Your merciless display of savagery intimidates your enemy, increasing their cooldown timers by 1 second for every enemy you struck, to a maximum of 3 seconds. This effect lasts for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You brutally crush all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}. Your merciless display of savagery intimidates your enemy, increasing their cooldown timers by 1 second for every enemy you struck, to a maximum of 3 seconds. This effect lasts for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Short Temper
data.description: While you are in the Berserk state, all of your cooldowns are reduced by 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: While you are in the Berserk state, all of your cooldowns are reduced by 5 seconds.

data.name: Slaughter
data.description: Your Action Point costs are reduced by 5 points while Furious and 10 points while Berserk.
data.rawDescription: Your Action Point costs are reduced by 5 points while Furious and 10 points while Berserk.

data.name: Slow Down
data.description: You deal 141 damage and reduce the movement speed of your enemy by 40% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Spellbreaker
data.note:
Must be Furious or Berserk
Exhausts your Rage
Requires Great Weapon
data.description:
A shattering strike which deals 216 damage and will remove one damage absorbing effect, one Enchantment and one Blessing from the target. Any effects removed from the target will inflict an additional 64 damage for each one.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

A shattering strike which deals {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} and will remove one damage absorbing effect, one Enchantment and one Blessing from the target. Any effects removed from the target will inflict an additional {ABIL_3053_COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} for each one.

If you are Furious, gains a 75% damage bonus instead of the 25% bonus.

data.name: Spine Crusher
data.note: Target must be facing away from you
data.description: You deal 216 damage to your enemy.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your enemy.

data.name: Stoutness of Stone
data.description: You recover from Stuns and Knockdowns 50% quicker. You will still gain immunity based on the original duration.
data.rawDescription: You recover from Stuns and Knockdowns {COM_0_VAL1}% quicker. You will still gain immunity based on the original duration.

data.name: Stubbornness
data.description: Increases your Corporeal resistance by 252.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Corporeal resistance by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.rawDescription: Reduces the cost of Spine Crusher and Deathblow by {COM_0_VAL1}%.

data.name: Unleashed Power
data.description: You unleash a wave of power, causing groupmates' attacks to deal an additional 200 damage for 10 seconds while within 100 feet of you.
data.rawDescription: You unleash a wave of power, causing groupmates' attacks to deal an additional {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} while within 100 feet of you.

data.name: Untouchable
data.description: Your chance to defend attacks is increased by 100% for 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Your chance to defend attacks is increased by {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Holding Grudges
data.description: Every 4 seconds, you will gain one stack of an effect which reduces the Rage cost of your Exhaustive Blows by 25%. This effect stacks up to 3 times, and using an Exhaustive Blow will consume one stack.
